Package eu.opends.hmi

Class LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel
eu.opends.hmi.LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel
public class LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel
extends PresentationModel
This class represents the presentation of a local danger warning. The distance between the moving car and a danger area is measured in order to update the distance information in the presentation.
Author:
Rafael Math

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel

    car, currentRoundedDist, minimumDistance, precisionFactor, previousRoundedDist, targetPosition

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel​(Car car, com.jme3.math.Vector3f targetPosition, java.lang.String type)
    Initializes a local danger warning presentation model by setting the positions of the car and danger area, the minimum distance from the danger area to cancel the presentation and the name of the warning.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    long createPresentation()
    Creates a local danger warning presentation task on the HMI GUI.
    java.lang.String generateMessage()
    Generates a message containing type of warning and distance to the danger area.
    void stop()  
    void updatePresentation​(long presentationID)
    Updates a local danger warning presentation model if the time the car takes to arrive at the danger area has changed or if the distance to the danger area has changed.

    Methods inherited from class eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel

    computeCurrentParameters, computePreviousParameters, getExactDistanceToTarget, getRoundedDistanceToTarget, getTimeToTarget, hasChangedParameter, setCar, shiftCurrentToPreviousParameters, stopPresentation

  • Constructor Details

    • LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel

      public LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel​(Car car, com.jme3.math.Vector3f targetPosition, java.lang.String type)
      Initializes a local danger warning presentation model by setting the positions of the car and danger area, the minimum distance from the danger area to cancel the presentation and the name of the warning.
      Parameters:
      car - Car heading towards the danger area
      targetPosition - Position of the danger area's center
      type - Name of the local danger warning (internal representation)

  • Method Details

    • createPresentation

      public long createPresentation()
      Creates a local danger warning presentation task on the HMI GUI. This data will only be sent to the HMI bundle once.
      Specified by:
      createPresentation in class PresentationModel
      Returns:
      0

    • updatePresentation

      public void updatePresentation​(long presentationID)
      Updates a local danger warning presentation model if the time the car takes to arrive at the danger area has changed or if the distance to the danger area has changed.
      Specified by:
      updatePresentation in class PresentationModel
      Parameters:
      presentationID - ID of presentation task to update.

    • generateMessage

      public java.lang.String generateMessage()
      Generates a message containing type of warning and distance to the danger area.
      Specified by:
      generateMessage in class PresentationModel
      Returns:
      Message containing type of warning and distance to the target.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Overrides:
      stop in class PresentationModel
